levels.description: Grants ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> to this unit and the closest <@ba.rem>Sniper</> Operator in front of this unit (prioritizes the tile directly in front); when attacking, this unit and the <@ba.rem>Sniper</> Operator have a <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to <@ba.vdown><$ba.stun>Stun</> themselves for {stun_time:0.0} seconds</>
